Benji Wallis
About Resume Works Gallery

I am Benji Wallis, a student at Otumoetai College with a strong passion for the technology side of theatre, IT, and electronics. I am proficient in programming languages such as CSS, JavaScript, HTML, and Python. My experience running shows at venues like Baycourt and TMT has been an invaluable asset to me, it has allowed me to develop a wide range of technical skills. From lighting and sound design, to AV and control systems, I have had the opportunity to apply my knowledge in a real-world setting. I believe that technology can play a crucial role in enhancing the theatrical experience, and I am always looking for new ways to utilize it in my projects.

In my free time, I immerse myself in the world of technology. I enjoy experimenting with different techniques and tools to find new and innovative ways to incorporate technology into my projects. Whether it's theatre, IT or electronics-related, I am always seeking to improve my understanding and mastery of the field. I am determined to make a difference and impact with my skills, in both the performance and professional worlds.
